title: ´I listened to my heart´ – Neymar extends Santos stay
description: Neymar said the decision to extend his stay at boyhood club Santos until the end of 2025 was made after he “listened to his heart”. The Brazilian’s previous contract with Santos was due to expire on June 30, but the Serie A side announced on Tuesday that the 33-year-old will remain at the club. It […] The post ´I listened to my heart´ – Neymar extends Santos stay appeared first on Soccer News.

title: Lage says Benfica deserve more respect after Bayern upset
description: Benfica coach Bruno Lage called for his team to receive the respect they deserve after they stunned Bayern Munich to top Group C at the Club World Cup. Benfica entered matchday three needing a result to ensure they finished above Boca Juniors and qualified for the last 16, while Bayern only required a point to […] The post Lage says Benfica deserve more respect after Bayern upset appeared first on Soccer News.
